Circular Tech Pioneers Network

Peer-to-peer community for circular economy technology leaders
A community of leaders eager to share their passion for the role of technology in the circular economy.
As the beta launch of this community, we invite you to help lay the foundation for a community that connects, inspires and fosters a safe space to share challenges and lessons learned. Supporting us all to achieve success as leaders while driving the circular economy forward.
Apply to join

Our Manifesto

In an era where innovation is becoming a key enabler for circularity, the Circular Tech Pioneers Beta Network embarks on a critical mission: to harness the collective wisdom and creativity of tech leaders passionate about forging a future where technology drives not just progress, but positive, regenerative change. We're crafting a vibrant, collaborative space to explore, challenge, and redefine the ways in which technology can heal and protect our planet. Together, we're not just envisioning a better, more circular world; we're laying the groundwork to build it, sharing insights, and pioneering solutions that pave the way for a regenerative future that benefits everyone.

Apply to join and co-create with us

As the beta launch of this community, we invite you to help lay the foundation for a network of leaders using digital technology to drive a truly, regenerative circular economy. Here's where you'll find your tribe - visionaries committed to actionable, systemic change.

Together, we will co-create a cross-sector, international community to facilitate engaging discussions, make connections and share hands-on insights.

This network will evolve to be our opportunity to connect with, share experiences between and support our peers who understand both the circular economy ambition and the challenging journey.

Who is this for?

Circular Economy Company Leaders
Founders
CEOs
CTOs
Circular Economy Product Innovators
Senior Product Managers
Product owners

Beta Community: A collaborative circle

As part of this beta phase, your voice and vision are crucial. You're not just joining a group of tech pioneers; you're actively participating in building a community that values open dialogue, practical insights, and collaborative innovation. We'll navigate the complexities of circularity hand in hand, share our victories and hurdles, and co-create a space where every question leads us closer to genuine sustainable & regenerative solutions.

I've spent more than 20 years as a software engineer and entrepreneur, and 10 exploring the role of digital as an enabler for circularity. There are so many passionate people working on circular economy technology solutions , yet all too often we are working in silos or unaware of the amazing work happening in a different area.

I'm initialing this community because we need more cross sector, geographical and cultural diverse connections between the leaders powering the technology that enables the circular economy transition. A just transition to a truly regenerative circular economy, powered by context appropriate technology that balances business success, social justice and environmental impact.

Barry O'Kane, HappyPorch

The Future of the Community

Help us develop a network that will delve into the nuances of making circular technology genuinely regenerative. As we will embark on this learning journey, we will collectively determine the best ways to achieve that, but our initial ideas include:

Regular community-driven deep dives into specific challenges and innovations, led by you, your peers or invited guests, offering a rich exchange of actionable insights

Peer-to-peer sessions that foster a shared learning environment, encouraging open, practical problem-solving

Access to a curated library of resources, co-created by members, providing cross sector learning, tools and knowledge to implement and advance your projects.

Networking, connections and mutual support for collective success.

FAQs

Members should be leaders at the intersection of technology and circularity, who are passionate about leveraging technology for systemic change towards a more regenerative, circular economy.

  • We are looking for leaders who are actively pioneering circularity projects (in organisations of any size).
  • Your project(s) should have digital technology at the core.
  • To facilitate learning and connections across sectors and across geographies, we encourage applications from any sector, geography or type of organisation.
  • We also encourage applications from anyone actively working at the intersection of digital technology and the circular economy, regardless of race, gender, age, or disability. Diversity is strength.

The first step is to apply to join and fill out the application to tell us more about you. Once we review your application, we will invite you to a 1:1 call to get to know you better and discuss the intentions, desires and expectations for this project. If it's a match, then you will officially join our network!

No. There is no charge for joining and participating in the community.

We do ask that you commit at least a hour each month to engage with the community and connect with your peers.

You're slammed, we know and feel your pain! We do ask the members of the community set aside at least an hour per month to engage with the community and connect with peers.

We're confident, though, that the value and support will be more than worth your time. If you are accepted as a member, we also know that the value you can provide to your peers is equally important.

  • Once you join, you will get access to our community page. Feel free to comment on existing pages, contribute to ongoing discussions, and add resources you find valuable. You will also find to our community guidelines to ensure a positive experience for all members.
  • We hope that you will engage in our (online) networking and knowledge sharing events
  • We'll keep in touch via email (no spam, promise!)
  • You will also be invited to feedback and suggest improvements to make improve the community and help us ensure we are genuinely supporting and providing value to each other.

Ready to become a part of our collaborative circle of visionary tech leaders?

Apply to join us in shaping a practice-oriented, empathetic, and action-driven community, that will propel us toward a future where technology and circular principles converge to forge sustainable, transformative changes for our planet and society.
Once we review your application, and if you meet the criteria listed in the FAQ section, we will invite you to an introductory 1:1 call to set the scene and align. If it's a match, then you will officially join our Beta community.
